sentences.en: All round us was desert.
sentences.cn: 我们周围全是沙漠。

sentences.en: Frank Mariano negotiates the desert terrain in his battered pickup.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克·马里亚诺驾驶他那辆破烂不堪的皮卡车成功穿越了沙漠地带。

sentences.en: From a height, it looks like a desert.
sentences.cn: 从高处看，它像一片沙漠。

sentences.en: Go forth into the desert.
sentences.cn: 向前走进沙漠。

sentences.en: He also wants to use the water to irrigate barren desert land.
sentences.cn: 他也想用这些水灌溉荒漠。

sentences.en: He deserted from army intelligence last month.
sentences.cn: 他上个月从军队情报部门开了小差。

sentences.en: He is on a trek through the South Gobi desert.
sentences.cn: 他正徒步穿越南戈壁沙漠。

sentences.en: Helen was deserted by her husband.
sentences.cn: 海伦被丈夫遗弃了。

sentences.en: Large numbers of soldiers deserted as defeat became inevitable.
sentences.cn: 战败已成定局，许多士兵开小差跑了。

sentences.en: Many of the party’s traditional voters deserted it at the last election.
sentences.cn: 许多长期支持该党的选民在上一次选举中抛弃了它。

sentences.en: No one agrees on what counts as a desert.
sentences.cn: 关于沙漠的界定，众说纷纭。

sentences.en: The desert was luminous, starkly beautiful.
sentences.cn: 沙漠里泛着光，有一种荒凉之美。

sentences.en: The diamond towns are gradually being reclaimed by the desert.
sentences.cn: 这些钻石城镇正逐渐重归沙漠。

sentences.en: The paper'sprice rise will encourage readers to desert in even greater numbers.
sentences.cn: 报纸价格的上涨将导致更多的读者不再订阅。

sentences.en: The price rise caused many readers to desert the magazine.
sentences.cn: 价格上涨导致许多读者放弃了这本杂志。

sentences.en: The remote desert area is accessible only by helicopter.
sentences.cn: 只有乘直升机才能进入那遥远的荒漠地区。

sentences.en: the Sahara Desert
sentences.cn: 撒哈拉沙漠

sentences.en: The vehicles have been modified to suit conditions in the desert.
sentences.cn: 车辆已改装过以适应沙漠的环境。

sentences.en: They drove 600 miles across the desert.
sentences.cn: 他们驱车600英里穿越沙漠。

sentences.en: This area of the country is mostly desert.
sentences.cn: 该国的这一地区大部分是沙漠。

sentences.en: Those rockets landed in the desert.
sentences.cn: 那些火箭降落在了沙漠里。

sentences.en: those who caused great torment to others rarely got their just deserts.
sentences.cn: 那些给他人带来巨大痛苦的人很少受到应受的惩罚。

sentences.en: Young workers are more willing to desert jobs they don't like.
sentences.cn: 年轻职工对不喜欢的工作更易擅自离职。
